blog.title: Everyday Italian
blog.author: Giada De Laurentiis
blog.body: This word has two main meanings. The first has to do with being pleased and satisfied (feeling content)

blog.title: Harry Potter
blog.author: J K. Rowling
blog.body: making someone else feel happy and at peace with things (contenting them).

blog.title: XQuery Kick Start
blog.author: James McGovern
blog.body: The other meaning has to do with subject matter: the content of a history class might be American history

blog.title: Learning XML
blog.author: Erik T. Ray
blog.body: The content of a math class might be geometry. As long as there's a topic or subject, there's content.
